projects.title: AnyDesk Storage Organizer
projects.summary: Designed and validated a desk organizer with DFM and ergonomic considerations, including FEA checks on load-bearing features.
highlights: Modeled the organizer in SolidWorks with DFM and ergonomic principles.
Performed FEA on load-bearing components to confirm structural adequacy.
Optimized print orientation and slicing strategy to reduce support usage.
Fabricated, assembled (epoxy-based), and tested the final prototype with strong dimensional accuracy and finish quality.

projects.title: Analysis on Ford Ranger Torsion Bar
projects.summary: Nonlinear static torsion analysis of a 2011 Ford Ranger torsion bar, including mesh convergence to ensure result stability.
highlights: Modeled a 2011 Ford Ranger torsion bar geometry and prepared simulation-ready CAD.
Ran nonlinear static FEA in ANSYS to evaluate torque-induced stress and deformation.
Identified critical regions using von Mises stress and total deformation results.
Applied a mesh convergence strategy to validate stability across element refinements.
